forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 15 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West northwest wind 9 to 15 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the skies display a canvas of mostly sunny hues, yet the city's unique charm is softened by a gentle coastal breeze. With temperatures hovering around a mild sixty degrees, the atmosphere feels refreshingly crisp, inviting residents to savor the outdoors while the sun bathes the streets in a gentle glow. Although the horizon appears clear, a soft marine layer may be fading in the distance, reminding us of the San Francisco fog that sometimes wraps the city in its mysterious embrace.

As evening approaches, the temperature will dip to the low fifties, coaxing a layer of warmth to the forefront. A light jacket or sweater may be ideal, offering comfort against the cooling wind that whispers through the streets. The partly cloudy skies will add a touch of drama to the sunset, creating the perfect backdrop for an evening stroll along the waterfront or perhaps indulging in a quiet moment at a local café, where the tranquil hum of the city plays a melody all its own. Today, it seems, is a symphony of clarity and calm, inviting exploration and relaxation alike.
